reviews.review_msg: She is an amazing teacher. Her classes are interesting because she explains the topics clearly and encourages interaction. She communicates effectively and provides straightforward information. Her sense of humor makes her class even more enjoyable, and her exams are well-designed.
She is not understanding when it comes to your grade, and if you need help forget it she won't reply to your emails for at least 4 days.

little to no feedback is given. Takes a long time to respond to discussion/emails which is frustrating. timed quizzes were a pain if you asked her for more time she doesn't do anything. You can't contact TAs and if you contact her expect nothing but a reply saying she can't do anything . also don't expect her to spell your name right in emails.
